inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getReportPlan.

tags.description: Metadata that you can assign to help organize the report plans you create.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getReportPlan.

arn.description: ARN of the backup report plan.

creationTime.description: Date and time that a report plan is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

deploymentStatus.description: Deployment status of a report plan. The statuses are: `CREATE_IN_PROGRESS` | `UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS` | `DELETE_IN_PROGRESS` | `COMPLETED`.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

reportDeliveryChannels.description: An object that contains information about where and how to deliver your reports, specifically your Amazon S3 bucket name, S3 key prefix, and the formats of your reports. Detailed below.

reportSettings.description: An object that identifies the report template for the report. Reports are built using a report template. Detailed below.

tags.description: Metadata that you can assign to help organize the report plans you create.
